description: This file defines a ViewModel class for managing the game state in a number guessing game app for Android TV. It handles the target number, user input, attempts, feedback messages, and game over status, providing methods for user interactions such as appending digits, deleting input, submitting guesses, and starting a new game.

classes.name: GameViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages the game state for a number guessing game, providing properties for game data and methods for user interactions.

methods.name: appendDigit
methods.description: Adds a digit (0-9) to the current input while preventing leading zeros and limiting input length.

methods.name: deleteDigit
methods.description: Removes the last digit from the current input if present.

methods.name: submitGuess
methods.description: Parses the current input as a guess, updates attempts, provides feedback, and checks for correct guess to end the game.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Resets the game state and generates a new target number.
